org.apache.shiro.guice.web
Class GuiceShiroFilter

java.lang.Object

      org.apache.shiro.web.servlet.AbstractFilter
          org.apache.shiro.web.servlet.NameableFilter
              org.apache.shiro.web.servlet.OncePerRequestFilter
                  org.apache.shiro.web.servlet.AbstractShiroFilter
                      org.apache.shiro.guice.web.GuiceShiroFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.Filter, org.apache.shiro.util.Nameable
public class GuiceShiroFilter
extends org.apache.shiro.web.servlet.AbstractShiroFilter

Shiro filter that is managed by and receives its filter chain configurations from Guice. The convenience method to map this filter to your application is bindGuiceFilter.
